short_summary: The British Army will be operating out of Warsaw, Poland during the period of 5 December 2022 to 31 March 2023.
description: The CAF will be operating out of Warsaw, Poland during the period of 5 December 2022 to 31 March 2023 and will require accommodations for CAF personnel to carry out an enduring mission in the region.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Warsaw, Poland**
=====================================================

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01014259
**Solicitation Number:** W8484-230372/A

**Title**: Hotel Accommodations – Warsaw, Poland

**Description**: The Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) is seeking proposals for hotel accommodations to support personnel during a mission in Warsaw, Poland from December 5, 2022 to March 31, 2023.

**Procurement Category**: Service

**Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding

**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**: Europe

**Regions of Delivery**: Europe

**Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**:

* Name: Chelsea Fowler
* Email: [chelsea.fowler@forces.gc.ca](mailto:chelsea.fowler@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: 819-939-3627

**Submission Documents**: Please refer to the following attachments:

* [English Amendment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/24/5679a6c4670c1c4856c5b679e10fb384/eng_amendment_001_w8484-230372_warsaw.pdf)
* [English Amendment 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/25/5336993276bbaf9137ad07caed6ad886/eng_amendment_002_w8484-230372_warsaw.pdf)
* [English RFP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/22/009b6d18bf5f59e4b1294a181a8e14ab/w8484-230372_rfp_eng.pdf)
* [French Amendment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/24/6604efac19e8d2c5caa7144d9e58b2cb/fr_amendment_001_w8484-230372_warsaw.pdf)
* [French Amendment 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/25/aa857cd6559523d
